summary: The 'Montgomery GI Bill Selected Reserves Tuition Fairness Act of 2025' amends Title 38, United States Code, to address tuition costs for veterans using educational assistance. It directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to disapprove courses at public institutions that don't charge in-state tuition to veterans using certain educational benefits under Title 10 (related to the Selected Reserve). The bill also has some conforming amendments and specifies an effective date of August 1, 2026.
